protein.general_function: Involved in transferase activity, transferring hexosyl groups
protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the transfer of galactose to ceramide, a key enzymatic step in the biosynthesis of galactocerebrosides, which are abundant sphingolipids of the myelin membrane of the central nervous system and peripheral nervous system.

go_class.description: protein localization to paranode region of axon

reference.reference_text: Bosio A, Binczek E, Le Beau MM, Fernald AA, Stoffel W: The human gene CGT encoding the UDP-galactose ceramide galactosyl transferase (cerebroside synthase): cloning, characterization, and assignment to human chromosome 4, band q26. Genomics. 1996 May 15;34(1):69-75.
Kapitonov D, Yu RK: Cloning, characterization, and expression of human ceramide galactosyltransferase cDNA. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1997 Mar 17;232(2):449-53.
